18: where its owner puts its food
7230: for what purpose are your abundant sacrifices to me? says jehovah. i have had my fill of offerings of rams and fat of fatted beasts; the blood of bulls and sheep and heu2010goats i do not want. to what purpose is the multitude of your sacrifices unto me? saith the lord: i am full of the burnt offerings of rams, and the fat of fed beasts; and i delight not in the blood of bullocks, or of lambs, or of he goats. what to me is the multitude of your sacrifices? says the lord; i have had enough of burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fed beasts; i do not delight in the blood of bulls, or of lambs, or of goats. u201cthe multitude of your sacrificesu2014 what are they to me?u201d says the lord. u201ci have more than enough of burnt offerings, of rams and the fat of fattened animals; i have no pleasure in the blood of bulls and lambs and goats. u201cwhy this frenzy of sacrifices?u201d godu2019s asking. u201cdonu2019t you think iu2019ve had my fill of burnt sacrifices, rams and plump grainu2010fed calves? donu2019t you think iu2019ve had my fill of blood from bulls, lambs, and goats? u201cto what purpose is the multitude of your sacrifices to me?u201d says the lord. u201ci have had enough of burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fed cattle. i do not delight in the blood of bulls, or of lambs or goats. u201cwhat are your multiplied sacrifices to me?u201d says the lord. u201ci have had enough of burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fed cattle; and i take no pleasure in the blood of bulls, lambs or goats. to what purpose is the multitude of your sacrifices to me [unless they are the offering of the heart]? says the lord. i have had enough of the burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fed beasts [without obedience]; and i do not delight in the blood of bulls or of lambs or of hegoats [without righteousness]. u201cwhat are all your sacrifices to me?u201d asks the lord. u201ci have had enough of burnt offerings and rams and the fat of wellfed cattle; i have no desire for the blood of bulls, lambs, or male goats. u201cwhat are all your sacrifices to me?u201d asks the lord. u201ci have had enough of burnt offerings and rams and the fat of well-fed cattle; i have no desire for the blood of bulls, lambs, or male goats. what should i think about all your sacrifices? says the lord. iu2019m fed up with entirely burned offerings of rams and the fat of wellfed beasts. i donu2019t want the blood of bulls, lambs, and goats. u201cwhat makes you think i want all your sacrifices?u201d says the lord. u201ci am sick of your burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fattened cattle. i get no pleasure from the blood of bulls and lambs and goats. u201cwhat to me is the multitude of your sacrifices? says the lord; i have had enough of burnt offerings of rams and the fat of wellu2010fed beasts; i do not delight in the blood of bulls, or of lambs, or of goats. u201cof what benefit to me is the multitude of {your} sacrifices?u201d says jehovah. u201ci have had enough of whole burnt offerings of rams and the fat of wellfed animals; and in the blood of young bulls and male lambs and hegoats i have taken no delight. u201cof what benefit to me are your many sacrifices?u201d says jehovah. u201ci have had enough of your burnt offerings of rams and the fat of wellfed animals, and i have no delight in the blood of young bulls and lambs and goats. u201cwhat are the multitude of your sacrifices to me?u201d, says yahweh. u201ci have had enough of the burnt offerings of rams, and the fat of fed animals. i donu2019t delight in the blood of bulls, or of lambs, or of male goats. what have i to do with the multitude of your sacrifices, saith the lord? i am full of the burnt offerings of rams, and of the fat of fed beasts: and i desire not the blood of bullocks, nor of lambs, nor of goats. u201cwhat are your many sacrifices to me?u201d [it is yahveh who speaks] i have had enough of burnt offerings of rams, and the suet of fatted animals; i take no pleasure in the blood of bulls, or of lambs and goats. yahweh asks, u201cwhat do your many animal sacrifices mean to me? iu2019ve had enough of your burnt offerings of rams and enough fat from your fattened calves. iu2019m not pleased with the blood of bulls, lambs, or male goats. u201cwhat are your many gifts given in worship to me?u201d says the lord. u201ci have had enough burnt gifts of rams and the fat of cattle. and i am not pleased with the blood of bulls, lambs, or goats. he says, u201cdo you think i want all these sacrifices you keep offering to me? i have had more than enough of the sheep you burn as sacrifices and of the fat of your fine animals. i am tired of the blood of bulls and sheep and goats. u201cof what importance to me are your many sacrifices?u201d says the lord. u201ci am stuffed with burnt sacrifices of rams and the fat from steers. the blood of bulls, lambs, and goats i do not want. for what purpose is the multitude of your sacrifices to me? says the lord. i am full of the burnt offerings of rams, and the fat of fed animals. i do not delight in the blood of bulls, or of lambs, or of male goats. the lord says, u201cwhy do you continue giving me all these sacrifices? i have had enough of your sacrifices of rams and the fat from wellu2010fed animals. i donu2019t want the blood of those bulls, sheep, and goats. the lord says, u201ci do not want all these sacrifices you give me. i have had enough of your sacrifices of male sheep and fat from fine animals. i am not pleased by the blood of bulls, sheep and goats. u201cyour sacrifices mean nothing to me. i am sick of your offerings of rams and choice cattle; i donu2019t like the blood of bulls or lambs or goats. what unto me is the multitude of your sacrifices? saith jehovah: i have had enough of the burntu2010offerings of rams, and the fat of fed beasts; and i delight not in the blood of bullocks, or of lambs, or of heu2010goats. u201cwhat to me is the multitude of your sacrifices? says the lord; i have had enough of burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fed beasts; i do not delight in the blood of bulls, or of lambs, or of hegoats. u201cto what purpose is the multitude of your sacrifices unto me?u201d saith the lord. u201ci am full of the burnt offerings of rams and the fat of fed beasts; and i delight not in the blood of bullocks, or of lambs or of hegoats.
